title: A spatially resolved atlas of the human lung characterizes a gland-associated immune niche
description: Multiplexed single molecule fluorescence in situ hybridisation (smFISH) using RNAscope protocol with immunohistochemistry (IHC) on human lung and airway tissue fresh frozen in optimum cutting temperature compound. IBEX (iterative bleaching extends multiplexity) multiplex IHC on human lung and airway tissue fixed in paraformaldyhyde and frozen in optimum cutting temperature compound.
